name: Sneaky Crawly
description:
We've all heard the tale of the man that became a cockroach... but what about the tale of a cockroach that became a man....nequin?

Join this cockroach on a body hopping journey to escape from a futuristic and dystopian mall in the body of a mannequin, as he has to avoid sentries, sneak past cameras, and open gates.

You can also play this game on the web here!
